parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return ANSI content of the (text) clipboard. If Unicode support is desired, see [[forceUnicode]].

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Disabled in Multiplayer for security reasons</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''copyFromClipboard'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[copyFromClipboard]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[copyToClipboard]], [[diag_log]], [[forceUnicode]]
</value></part></template>
